title: Mexico : religion affiliation share 2018 , by type
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Catholic and lowest at Response Baptist evangelist.
Response Catholic has 808.0 times more Share of respondents than Response Baptist evangelist which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Catholic and lowest at Response Baptist evangelist.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 14 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Catholic and lowest at Response Baptist evangelist.
Response Catholic has 808.0 times more Share of respondents than Response Baptist evangelist which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
Response Catholic has the highest Share of respondents and Baptist evangelist has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response None has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 80.7.
Share of respondents at Response Catholic is 80.8 , second place is None at 10.6, and thirdly is Believer without formal affiliation to any religion at 2.8.
Response Adventist, Mormon, Agnostic, and Atheist have the same Share of respondents.
The average Share of respondents in all 14 Responses is 7.14.
The Share of respondents is 100.0 if we add up values of all Responses.

data.Response: Believer without formal affiliation to any religion
